content: go fish by gnathalie2 materials big size p hook the grey plastic one at wal mart size j or k hook any leftover crap yarn~ at least 2 colors i used a combination of ww chunky sport just whatever yarn you want to use big green fish pattern holding 3 or 4 strands of yarn together whatever fits 5 single_crochet in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 10 single_crochet rd2 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 15 single_crochet rd3 & 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 single_crochet rd5 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 20 single_crochet rd6 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 25 single_crochet rd7 & 8 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 25 single_crochet rd9 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd10-19 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 single_crochet stuff fish now chain 1 single_crochet across the fish through both sides *now chain 23 dtr in 4th chain from hook going down the length of the chain do a variety of dtrs trs dcs all the way down to the last possible spot to crochet in slip_stitch in 4th or 5th single_crochet over* chain 23 again and repeat from * to * till the end of the fish slip_stitch fasten_off weave in loose ends eyes make two using a size j or k hook and 2 strands held together 5 single_crochet in a ring slip_stitch to join rd1 chain 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 10 single_crochet rd2 switch colors chain 1 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 15 single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends sew to sides of the head blue/purple fish materials same as above pattern starting at tail end chain 13 rd1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across till last chain 3 single_crochet in last chain working on other side of chain single_crochet across 2 single_crochet in last chain 27 single_crochet rd2 & 3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 27 single_crochet rd4 decrease single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet 3 times 24 single_crochet rd5 decrease single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet 3 times 21 single_crochet rd6 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 13 single_crochet rd7-10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 13 single_crochet rd11 2sc in each single_crochet around 26 single_crochet rd12-18 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 26 single_crochet rd19 decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around single_crochet in last single_crochet 21 single_crochet rd20 decrease single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet rd21 & 22 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet rd23 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd24 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd25 decrease around 6 single_crochet fasten_off leave a long end weave it around/through the mouth and braid or whatever~ makes it look like it s on a line eyes~ same as above please note for the blue/purple fish the stitch count is not exact~ and it doesn t
